title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for a concave down curve that starts at the origin t = 0 and becomes horizontal as t = t1

One point is earned for a horizontal line from t = t1 to t = t2 that is continuous with first section

One point is earned for a straight line with a negative slope from t = t2 to the horizontal axis at t = t3 that is continuous with second section
